body: For me his art for this type of works never get bored if he makes each works other heroines like that and mind break & netorare combo, only mind break will be good from him, but as we see he have NTR fetish too, for me it's very nice, his art is god and i need English once again !

@That Guy 319 You are not criticizing the product u are simply bitching about the guy who produces the product just because his products dont suit your taste then again I dont expect you to understand the difference
Espero que el estudió que adapto daraku reijou también anime este manga

@metroid that's a terrible argument, people have access to many products that are free and still criticize the product if it's unsatisfactory. Like if u stream an anime on a website and give it a horrible review...same thing...plus I'm only saying this because I feel like Takeda is getting lazy, that's how you end up with crap like Miito Shido.

@ That Guy 319 said the bitch who doesnt pay a dime to read and just loves bitch about the author who knows what kind of works he produce Not to mention Takeda is nowhere repeating himself compared to some  other ntr writers such as sanbun and miito shido who dont even bother with creating new scenarios .
This needs a animation remerber me daraku reijou

I feel like I've seen this same type of NTR from this author before...oh yea that's cuz I have again and again and again...this  guy needs to shake it up a little...his recycled plots are losing their touch.
nice artwork hopefully it gets translated to English
that fat dude looks like he is working for the north korea administration?
Thanks for the late Christmas gift
